Hi! 👋 I'm Focus-Bot. I'm here to help you task manage, create critical todo lists, and keep you on track in Slacck 
 I can do the following:
📌 `/agenda` allows you to set a meeting agenda list. A small check list will appear where you can add and check off items.

🗒️ Type `/addsubject` followed by each key subject with a comma in between to set the meeting subject. If the topic of key words are not mentioned within 15 comments, I will send a brief reminder. To end this, type `/endsubject`

📒 Type `/list` to add an item to your ToDo list. You can rank importance, 1 is high importance and 10 low. Critical reminders (1-3) will be reminded each day, or when a due date is approaching for other tasks.
💻 `/Google` followed by the search topic, pulls up the first search result without leaving Slack.
